onyomiExamples.meaning: polishing (e.g. essay), revision, elaboration, refinement, improvement
polish, elaboration, repeatedly working over one's writing, being very scrupulous in the choice of diction

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to strike, to clap, to knock, to beat, to tap, to pat, to play drums, to abuse, to bash, to flame (e.g. on the Internet), to insult, to consult, to sound out, to brag, to talk big, to call, to invoke (e.g. a function)
